content: Hi, could someone take a brief look at this PR? Reviewing should be short (120-ish lines, nothing particularly scary). It defines cocardinal and cocountable filters analogous to docs#Cofinite and proves some basic facts about them. (In particular, that every cocardinal filter is a CardinalInterFilter with the corresponding cardinality). I can prove some more facts on them (analogous to what happens for cofinite), but I'd like to first get this merged or get some green light on the way everything is structured before putting more time in this!
